sentences.en: Opponents denounced the law as undemocratic and unconstitutional.
sentences.cn: 反对者们抨击这项法律是不民主的、是违反宪法的。

sentences.en: Lincoln decided that seceding from the Union was unconstitutional.
sentences.cn: 林肯判定退出联邦是违反宪法的。

sentences.en: The Supreme Court unanimously ruled that racial segregation in schools was unconstitutional.
sentences.cn: 最高法院一致裁定学校实施的种族隔离措施违反宪法。
